text: Sultan Haji Ahmad Shah Al-Musta'in Billah Ibni Almarhum Sultan Abu Bakar Riayatuddin Al-Muadzam ShahInformation Malaysia (1989), pg 123 (24 October 1930 - 22 May 2019) was the fifth Sultan of Pahang from 1974 until his abdication in 2019. He was the seventh Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia from 26 April 1979 to 25 April 1984. He was born in Pekan, Pahang.High noon at FAM Congress as TM Pahang takes over, Eric Samuel, 2014/05/25, The Star Online Sultan Ahmad Shah died on 22 May 2019 at the National Heart Institute in Kuala Lumpur from a long-illness at the age of 88. ==Foreign Honours== * : Grand Cross of the Order of the Liberator General San Mart√≠n (26 September 2006)DECRETO NACIONAL 1.256/2006 * : ** Recipient of Royal Family Order of the Crown of Brunei (DKMB) ** Senior (Laila Utama) of the Family Order of Brunei (DK) * : Collar of the Order of Mubarak the Great * : Star of the Socialist Republic of Romania 1st class (25 November 1982) * : Badr Chain (January 1982)Royal Ark * : Grand Order of Mugunghwa * : Queen Elizabeth II Coronation Medal (2 June 1953) ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Yang di-Pertuan Agong Category:Pahang
title: Ahmad Shah of Pahang
